about.name: Prashant Kumar Rai
about.title: Software Developer
summary: I am currently working at Siemens Healthineers, gaining hands-on experience in cutting-edge technologies. I am pursuing B.Tech in CSE from VIT Bhopal University, with a CGPA of 8.72. I have strong interests in backend, cloud computing, and blockchain.
During my internship at RDSO, I implemented RBAC using Django for 200+ users. I’ve also built projects on blockchain-based crowdfunding and housing for army personnel.
I'm skilled in React, Node.js, Django, Web3, and AWS. I'm an AWS Cloud Practitioner and have solved 900+ coding challenges on LeetCode and Codeforces.

roles.title: Software Developer Intern
roles.shortDescription: I collaborated with a group of 5 to integrate Django’s RBAC into RDSO’s admin system for 200+ users. My contributions included:
points: Developed a role assignment matrix to improve access control security.
Designed a user-friendly role management interface for faster adoption.
Implemented automated testing to ensure RBAC feature reliability.
Led training sessions for smooth system transition and user onboarding.
Built a scalable permission assignment system that reduced audit time from weeks to days.
